alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Wayne County through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cabell, or 13 miles west of Monticello, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cabell around 415 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Parnell, Susie, Zula, Monticello, Cooper, Hidalgo, Powersburg and Slickford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
